title: I didnt get my boost for verifying email?
body: I just made this account but didnt get the little boost thingy I was promised if I verified my email? Why not? :(

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up and it looks like the IP Boost that was added didn't work quite right for some reason. I manually went in and added that 4 win IP boost for ya, and you should be good to go ^_^!
